mapper.insert: insert into HSP_ECG_INF (ECG_SEQ, REF_ID, ECG_TYPE, FILE_NAME, FILE_DATE, FILE_TRS_DATE, FILE_DIA_DATE, FILE_PATH, FILE_TYPE, APP_NO, MPI_NO, SAD_ID, CRT_DATE, CRT_USER, FILE_CON ) values (HSPECGINF_SEQ.nextval, #{refId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ecgType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fileTrsDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fileDiaDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{appNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mpiNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sadId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sysdate, #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileCon,jdbcType=BLOB} )
